law.text: The military judge of a court-martial may, for reasonable cause, grant a continuance to any party for such time and as often as appears to be just.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 41, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 26. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 39, effective July 1, 1954.
